title: May’s Group Ride Giveaway: Yoshimura Chilao SS Pedals and Swag
content:
It’s already May! What a whirwind this year has been. Support our independent Reportage by signing up for our Group Ride subscription plan. In doing so, you support this website’s staff and gain access to our Rad Bazaar!

Check this post out for all the information on how to join Group Ride for $6.66/month or $69.69/year.
SIGN UP HERE.

We’ve partnered with Yoshimura to give away a set of its all-new, high tech Chilao SS pedals and a swag bag for our May Group Ride giveaway! Sign up by May 31th for your chance to win!

Congrats to Kelly from Puyallup, Washington, for winning the Microshift Sword kit!

The post May’s Group Ride Giveaway: Yoshimura Chilao SS Pedals and Swag appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
